detail_desc: Sleeveless, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a double layer at the top and slits in the sides of the hem.
Wide blouse in a soft weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, short dolman sleeves and ties at the hem.
Fitted blouse in airy linen with a sweetheart neckline and a small opening with ties at the front. Short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems, and smocking at the back.
Long tunic in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a turtle neck, long sleeves and slits at the sides of the hem.
Shorts in sturdy cotton denim. High paper bag waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim and a zip fly with press-studs. Side and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shaftless, no-show socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in crinkled jersey made partly from recycled polyester with short puff sleeves and elastication with a small frill trim around the top, sleeves and hem.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit cotton with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Double-layered hat in a fine knit containing glittery threads with an embroidered motif on the turned-up hem and faux fur pompoms on top.
Sports set with a short-sleeved top and shorts in fast-drying, functional fabric. Top with a print motif on the front and reflective details. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, small embroidery detail at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with shoulder sections and a chest pocket in woven fabric. The pocket has a flap with a hook and loop fastening. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder jersey top in a soft viscose blend with a V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a high collar and hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, fleece-lined handwarmer pockets, patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud, and an inner pocket with a press-stud. Partially concealed tab with a button and inner ribbing at the cuffs, and a concealed, elasticated drawstring at the waist. Lined.

Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, small jetted coin pocket at the front, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Tapered legs with narrow hems.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.

Push-up body in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, and a half-string back. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an opening with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Ankle-length pull-on trousers in soft twill with elastic at the back of the waist. Loose fit with a fake fly, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, lightly padded cups and ties at the back and back of the neck.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, extra-long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Scarf in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides.
Wide, sturdy belt with a metal buckle that has a stud at the back. Width 3.4 cm.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.

Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a gathered yoke at the back and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, a button at the front, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and silk blend with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave. High waist with covered elastication.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline.
Top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Hi-tops in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Straight-cut blouse in lace with a small stand-up collar, press-studs at the back of the neck, long, slightly wider sleeves and cuffs with press-studs.
Double-layered headband in a soft, chunky knit with a knot detail at the front.
Short-sleeved sports top with a jersey front, mesh back and sleeves with mesh sections at the armholes. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in velour with a stand-up collar with concealed buttons at the back of the neck and a V-neck front and back, seam at the waist, side pockets and wide, straight legs.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details. Slim fit with a regular waist and zip fly.
Short top in glittery jersey with a wrapover detail at the front and long sleeves.
Bikini briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Outdoor jacket with light padding front and back in woven fabric and a lined hood. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Lightly brushed thermal lining in the sleeves and sides. Partly lined.
Silk top with a V-neck and spaghetti straps. Lined.
Jacquard-knit slippers with a hook and loop fastening at the back of the shaft, soft pile linings and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Short dress in an airy, patterned weave with lace details. Small frilled collar, an opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Lined skirt.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless dress in an airy weave with a pleated V-neck front and back, concealed zip in the side and gathered seam at the waist with a flared skirt. Satin lining.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Straight-style top in jersey crêpe with a boat neck. Short, wide sleeves with pleats and double-layered trims.

Suit trousers in a softly draping, wool-blend weave with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and an adjustable tab with a metal fastener at the sides. Zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and slightly shorter legs with creases and turn-ups at the hems. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Top in soft jersey with a round neck and short sleeves.
Bracelet in glittery imitation leather decorated with a silicone unicorn. Size 2.5x21 cm.
Bag in braided paper straw with round wooden handles at the top. Unlined. Size approx. 13x26x42 cm.
Leather sandals with straps with adjustable fasteners and a tab with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Moulded thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Pull-on, ankle-length trousers in a patterned viscose weave with an elasticated waist and side pockets in a loose fit with tapered legs.
A pair of metal hoop earrings with rainbow-shaped pendants decorated with colourful glass rhinestones. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Hooded top in printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.

Ankle-length trousers woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a high, paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and tapered legs with flap leg pockets.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Tunic in an airy cotton weave with embroidery at the front. Small, pompom-trimmed stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening at the front with narrow ties at the top and wide, 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the hips with a pompom trim and a lined, flared tier to the hem.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, pleats at the front and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dresses in patterned cotton jersey with a gathered, frilled seam at the hips and a flared skirt.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a turned-up hem.

Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and gathered yoke at the back. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in lace with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a grosgrain bow at the sides. Soft jersey lining.
Cropped vest top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Warm-lined Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Faux fur linings, imitation leather insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Short dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, a seam with a tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Partly lined.
Blouse in a crinkled plumeti viscose weave with embroidery at the top, a V-neck and gathered seam under the bust with a crocheted lace trim. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft jersey.

Short dress in soft velour with a round neckline, a deep opening at the back and concealed button at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, short, wide sleeves, a seam at the waist and gathers in the sides of the skirt for a close fit. Jersey lining.
High-waisted, short skirt in chiffon with a concealed zip and button at one side, elastication at the back of the waist and pleats front and back to create soft draping. Lined.

Sleeveless, V-neck dress in an airy viscose weave with a sheen. Opening and a covered button at the back of the neck and frills at the shoulders that continue down the sides. Gathered seam at the waist with smocking at the back, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Knee-length skirt in airy chiffon with a high, elasticated, ribbed waistband. Lined.
Fabric loafers. Heel 2 cm.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an opening at the back with a sewn-in tie detail, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut tunic in a lightweight cotton weave with embroidered details. Opening at the front with narrow twisted ties at the top and raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Warm-lined boots in woven fabric and imitation leather with lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a zip in one side. Faux fur linings and insoles and sturdy, patterned soles.

Short-sleeved shirt with a bow tie and waistcoat in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Waistcoat with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Lined.
